name: ASSUC- European Association of Sugar Traders
membership: Member of SACAR (Joint Secretariat of Agricultural Trade Association)
goal:
ASSUC’s mission is to:

- Promote the visibility of the professional sector of the sugar trade;

- Represent and defend the general interests of our members;

-Facilitate cooperation among operators in the sugar trade sector at European level;

-Provide a networking platform for traders (importers, exporters, dealers, brokers and distributors) in sugar and its derivatives.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Consumers, Culture, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: EU and international trade, customs legislation, and agricultural and food policy
